summary: Seasoned MDM Architect with 11+ years in IT, experienced in MDM solutions architecture, leading projects, data quality and de-duplication, and end-to-end delivery across financial services, retail, healthcare and telecom domains. Proficient in TIBCO MDM, CIM, EMS, BW/Business Events, data modeling, and Java/J2EE development; strong communication and leadership skills.

experience.title: Senior Architect - MDM
experience.description: MDM implementation landscape; Technical/Functional Design for MDM with Data Quality and de-duplication; Architecture for Vendor and Customer MDM; End-to-end MDM development and delivery; Daily status/scrum; Stakeholder management.

experience.title: Senior Architect - MDM
experience.description: MDM architecture overview; Design workflows for MDM with Data Quality; TIBCO MDM installation overview.

experience.title: Senior Architect - MDM
experience.description: Lead MDM team (10 members); Architect and engineer complex MDM workflows and AML data requirements; Design workflows and business rules; MDM infrastructure sizing, installation planning and implementation.

experience.title: Senior Architect - MDM
experience.description: MDM architecture overview; Design and showcase MDM workflow for Parameterized Data Quality; Design parameterized Data Quality workflows in TIBCO MDM.

experience.title: MDM Architect
experience.description: Architect/lead the MDM efforts; Manage/Lead MDM team; Develop complex MDM workflows and rulebases; TIBCO MDM installation planning and implementation.

experience.title: Senior Architect - MDM
experience.description: Single View of membership project; Data migration from legacy systems to SVoM; Data de-duplication using TIBCO Matching Engine; CIM MDM repositories; Lead CIM MDM team.

experience.title: Architect - MDM
experience.description: Architectural design for TIBCO MDM integration with TIBCO BW; Performance tuning; Rule bases and workflows; NSOS CIM/TIBCO EMS integration; Administration; Documentation and knowledge transfer; Production support.

experience.title: Operations Engineer and Lead
experience.description: BSBA style responsibilities: mapping documents; Integrated Smart Mapper with TIBCO CIM; Performance tuning; Rule bases and workflows; EMS configuration; CIM administration; Data synchronization; Test cases; Oracle configuration; Production support.

experience.title: Senior System Analyst
experience.description: Analysis and design of TIBCO CIM workflows for data feeds; Testing and defect resolution; Top-down architecture for importing client data; EAI using TIBCO BW.

experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: Developed Struts-based application; WebLogic configuration; Implemented Classification Module; Deployment in QA; Test case development.

experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: Analyze/Design for Customer data repository; HCP master data; Sales alignment features; Developed classification modules; UAT support.

experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: Design and documentation of process flows; Multitier architecture; Struts-based development; Server configuration; Deployment across environments; Configuration management; Test plans.

experience.title: System Analyst
experience.description: Transformed business process specs to technical specs; MVC web app design with Struts; JDBC connectivity; EJBs; Data processing.
